name: places/ChIJv5GNreL1wokRi5DBSar1qiA
formattedAddress: 333 E 118th St, New York, NY 10035, USA
adrFormatAddress: 333 E 118th St, New York, NY 10035, USA

originalText.text: I thought this day care was different but actually they can't be one because kids need attention and there are not paying attention to them. Sometimes they give them snack other time they don't. My little girl is 2 years old and she was getting home without things on her bag or with marks on her body and they don't even know how she got it. Not only that she was the only girl 2 years old and they had her always with big kids age 6-8. And when I went the first time they told me the kids are separated by age and they are not. They also told me they give food to the kids and milk. Some day I got there and my daughter crying because she wanted milk. This is ridiculous if you can't handle a day care don't offer the service please!! The only one that really knows how little kids are supposed to be treated is Mrs. Mathew but Dr. Falu won't let her work because she wants her to be in charge of everything at the same time. Some times they don't even have staff for the after school pick up either. I would never recommend this place!!!

originalText.text: This after school has not picked up my child multiple times. The staff forgets and does not offer solutions even while being paid on time. This after school is terrible I would never recommend anyone to go to this school. Childrens property get stolen very incompetent after school.
